title: pbe download super slow (40kbps ETA 4000 minutes)
body: please help i really want to play pbe ive been sitting here for the last 2 hours and it went up 7% ive tried the administrator fix (doesnt work)

replies.body: Eeeeeee whelp, about that xD. Go ahead and double check the other steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) just to be safe, and if that still doesn't help reach out to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
nah its fine il just wait thw 25 hours xD i can play league or live servers while it downloads anyways its at 14% after 4 hours :/

YOu might be able to get a bit of a faster download by using an ethernet cable as opposed to wifi, but there may also be a few [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) that might need a couple updates. Run through each step in that guide, but make sure to pay close attention to port forwarding.
